description: A Dashboard to monitor Synology NAS

targets.query: SELECT last("modelName") AS "Synology Model", last("version") AS "DSM Version", last("serialNumber") AS "Serial Number" FROM "snmp.SYNO" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$diskstation$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "cpuFanStatus" FROM "snmp.SYNO" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$diskstation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "agent_host"
SELECT "raidTotalSize" - raidFreeSize FROM "raidTable" WHERE ("raidName" =~ /^$volume$/ AND "agent_host" =~ /^$diskstation$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT moving_average(mean("laLoadInt"), 5) FROM "laTable" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$diskstation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "laNames"

SELECT last("diskModel") AS "Model", last("diskStatus") AS "Status", last("diskType") AS "Disk Type", last("diskTemperature") AS "CurrentC", max("diskTemperature") AS "MaxC", min("diskTemperature") AS "MinC", "synology"."autogen"."diskSMARTTable"."diskSMARTAttrRaw" AS "MinC" FROM "diskTable" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$diskstation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "diskID", "devicePath"

SELECT mean("raidTotalSize") AS "SizeTotal", mean("raidFreeSize") AS "SizeFree", "raidTotalSize" - mean(raidFreeSize) AS "SizeFree" FROM "raidTable" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$diskstation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "raidName"
SELECT moving_average(mean("laLoadInt"), 5) FROM "laTable" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$diskstation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "laNames"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ifTable" WHERE ("agent_host" = '192.168.1.5') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: show tag values from "snmp.SYNO" with key="agent_host"
list.label: Disk Station
list.name: diskstation
list.query: show tag values from "snmp.SYNO" with key="agent_host"

list.definition: show tag values from "raidTable" with key="raidName" where "agent_host" =~ /$diskstation/
list.label: Volume
list.name: volume
list.query: show tag values from "raidTable" with key="raidName" where "agent_host" =~ /$diskstation/

list.definition: show tag values from "diskSMARTTable" with key="diskSMARTInfoDevName" where "agent_host" =~ /$diskstation/
list.label: Disk Path
list.name: diskPath
list.query: show tag values from "diskSMARTTable" with key="diskSMARTInfoDevName" where "agent_host" =~ /$diskstation/

title: Synology
